San Francisco Restore the Fourth Protest Video Documentary - July 4, 2013

Thought I would celebrate our freedoms by attending the nations' first protest against the NSA's threat to freedom at  the Restore the Fourth SF rally on 4th of July.  I wasn’t planning to record the entire rally and march but I was in a unique position to document a little bit of history. Enjoy the videos:

 

Restore The Fourth Rally & Protest - San Francisco California - July 4, 2013 - Part One

[pexyoutube pex_attr_src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7Fy2x8JGbw" pex_attr_width="200"][/pexyoutube]

[pexyoutube pex_attr_src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xuDqxGvv-Mw" pex_attr_width="300"][/pexyoutube]
